comment.text: This text appears on an empty screen when no Minecraft server connections are available. It informs the user that no MCP servers are currently connected, and is used within a selector component. Translators should ensure the message conveys the lack of server connections clearly.

usage.context:
<Selector
 items={servers}
 emptyScreenImage={
 isBase ? EmptyScreenRoomSvgUrl : EmptyScreenRoomDarkSvgUrl
 }
 emptyScreenHeader={t("Common:NoMCPServers")}
 emptyScreenDescription={t("Common:NoMCPServersDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 searchEmptyScreenImage={
 isBase ? EmptyScreenRoomSvgUrl : EmptyScreenRoomDarkSvgUrl
